articles.title: Handball law changed as IFAB confirms new 'accidental' ruling after latest controversy - Mirror Online
articles.description: IFAB have changed the handball law so that accidental offences that lead to a goal will no longer been penalised following last night's controversial decision to rule out Fulham's goal vs Tottenham
articles.content: Accidental handball that leads to a team-mate scoring a goal or having a goal-scoring opportunity will no longer be considered an offence, the games law-making body the International Football Associa… [+1763 chars]
